Politics & Bureaucratic Capacity - Financing
Financing score; where a score of 1 indicates low effectiveness and 5 indicates high effectiveness in terms of adequacy, efficiency, and equity.
(Financing) - Adequacy expressed by the per child spending
(Financing) Efficiency - Expressed by the score from the Public Expenditure and Financial Accountability (PEFA) assessment; where 0 is the lowest possible efficiency and 1 is the highest
(Financing) Efficiency - Expressed by the relationship between financing and outcomes; where 0 is the lowest possible efficiency and 1 is the highest
(Financing) - Equity
Politics & Bureaucratic Capacity - Impartial Decision-Making
Average score for Impartial Decision-Making; where a score of 1 indicates low effectiveness and 5 indicates high effectiveness
(Impartial Decision-Making) average score for politicized personnel management
(Impartial Decision-Making) average score for politicized policy-making
(Impartial Decision-Making) average score for politicized policy implementation
(Impartial Decision-Making) average score for employee unions as facilitators
Politics & Bureaucratic Capacity - Mandates & Accountability

(Mandates & Accountability) Average score for transparency
(Mandates & Accountability) Average score for accountability of public officials
Politics & Bureaucratic Capacity - National Learning Goals

(National Learning Goals) Average score for community engagement
